sermons.title: Finding Purpose in Technology
sermons.description: Exploring how technology can be used as a tool for ministry and service to others.
sermons.notes: As iron sharpens iron, so one person sharpens another. How can we use technology to sharpen and serve our communities?

sermons.title: Digital Discipleship
sermons.description: Building authentic community and discipleship in the digital age.
sermons.notes: Go and make disciples of all nations... How do we fulfill the Great Commission in our connected world?

series.name: Tech & Faith
series.description: Exploring the intersection of technology and faith
